pullrequest.title: Modify topic remaps to use sensor default topics

content.raw:
Update: I bridged fluid pressure and magnetic field sensor topics in  [49ad893](#!/osrf/subt/commits/49ad893ee86789f5af5cc8fecc58dd95f7d4d980)

I manually checked a few different robot configurations and confirmed that sensor data should now work properly. Two robots with same configuration also works \(fixes issue #75\)

After this is merged, we’ll need to make a new release of ign-gazebo and ign-sensors before I can upload the updated robot models onto ignition fuel, otherwise users may run into a crash without this fix from [ign-gazebo pull request](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/363/set-default-topics-for-rendering-sensors/diff)
content.html:
Update: I bridged fluid pressure and magnetic field sensor topics in 49ad893

I manually checked a few different robot configurations and confirmed that sensor data should now work properly. Two robots with same configuration also works (fixes issue #75)

After this is merged, we’ll need to make a new release of ign-gazebo and ign-sensors before I can upload the updated robot models onto ignition fuel, otherwise users may run into a crash without this fix from ign-gazebo pull request
